snippet: The ocean giants are being lured by an increase this year in their favorite food, shrimplike creatures known as krill, biologists said.
abstract: Blue whales are being spotted in droves off the Northern California coast; whales, rarely seen in the area, are being lured by an increase in the population of krill.
lead_paragraph: The ocean giants are being lured by an increase this year in their favorite food, shrimplike creatures known as krill, biologists said.

headline.main: California: Rare Sighting of Blue Whales
headline.print_headline: California: Rare Sighting of Blue Whales
